description.en: PPIO Cloud is a leading distributed cloud provider in China, offering AI cloud services including GPU computing, model APIs, and edge computing.
description.zh-CN: PPIO派欧云是中国领先的分布式云服务商，提供高性价比的AI云服务，包括GPU计算、模型API和边缘计算，适用于AI、音视频和元宇宙等应用场景。

description.en: SiliconFlow provides a one-stop cloud service platform with high-performance inference for top-tier large language and embedding models.
description.zh-CN: SiliconFlow 提供一站式云服务平台，为顶级大语言模型和嵌入模型提供高性能推理服务。

description.en: LiteLLM is a lightweight library to simplify LLM completion and embedding calls, providing a consistent interface for over 100 LLMs.
description.zh-CN: LiteLLM 是一个轻量级库，用于简化 LLM 的补全和嵌入调用，为 100 多个 LLM 提供一致的接口。

description.en: Qiniu AI provides efficient, stable, and secure model inference services, supporting mainstream open-source large models.
description.zh-CN: 七牛云AI 提供高效、稳定、安全的模型推理服务，支持主流开源大模型。

description.en: AiHubMix is a reliable AI model API routing service that provides a unified interface for various large language and embedding models.
description.zh-CN: AiHubMix 是一个可靠的 AI 模型 API 路由服务，为各种大语言模型和嵌入模型提供统一的接口。

description.en: ocool AI provides a platform for accessing a wide range of large language and embedding models through an OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: ocool AI 提供一个通过 OpenAI 兼容 API 访问各种大语言模型和嵌入模型的平台。

description.en: Alibaba Cloud Bailian provides powerful AI models, including the Qwen series, and supports OpenAI-compatible APIs for both text generation and embedding.
description.zh-CN: 阿里云百炼提供强大的AI模型（包括通义千问系列），并为文本生成和向量嵌入提供兼容 OpenAI 的 API。

description.en: DeepSeek provides advanced AI models with strong capabilities in coding and reasoning, accessible through an OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: DeepSeek 提供在编程和推理方面具有强大能力的先进 AI 模型，可通过兼容 OpenAI 的 API 进行访问。

description.en: OpenRouter provides unified access to hundreds of AI models (including embedding models) from various providers through a single OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: OpenRouter 通过单一的 OpenAI 兼容 API 提供对来自各种提供商的数百个 AI 模型（包括嵌入模型）的统一访问。

description.en: Hugging Face Inference provides access to a vast library of open-source AI models for various tasks, including text generation and embedding, through its Inference Providers API.
description.zh-CN: Hugging Face Inference 通过其 Inference Providers API 提供对庞大的开源 AI 模型库的访问，支持文本生成和嵌入等多种任务。

description.en: Replicate provides a platform to run thousands of open-source AI models, including text generation and embedding, with a cloud API.
description.zh-CN: Replicate 提供一个平台，让您可以通过云 API 运行数以千计的开源 AI 模型，包括文本生成和嵌入。

description.en: Groq provides ultra-low latency inference for large language models using its LPU™ Inference Engine, accessible via an OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: Groq 使用其 LPU™ 推理引擎为大型语言模型提供超低延迟推理，可通过兼容 OpenAI 的 API 进行访问。

description.en: Cohere provides enterprise-grade large language models for text generation (Command) and state-of-the-art text and image embedding models (Embed).
description.zh-CN: Cohere 提供企业级的大型语言模型，用于文本生成（Command 系列）和最先进的文本与图像嵌入模型（Embed 系列）。

description.en: Mistral AI offers powerful and efficient open-source and commercial models for text generation and embedding, accessible via an OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: Mistral AI 提供强大而高效的开源及商业模型，用于文本生成和嵌入，可通过兼容 OpenAI 的 API 进行访问。

description.en: Perplexity provides AI models with real-time web search capabilities, delivering up-to-date and cited answers, accessible via an OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: Perplexity 提供具备实时网络搜索能力的 AI 模型，可提供带引用的最新答案，通过兼容 OpenAI 的 API 进行访问。

description.en: Zhipu AI provides advanced GLM models for text generation and embedding, accessible via an OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: 智谱AI 提供先进的 GLM 模型，用于文本生成和向量嵌入，可通过兼容 OpenAI 的 API 进行访问。

description.en: Anthropic provides the Claude family of large language models, known for their performance, reliability, and safety, accessible via a native API.
description.zh-CN: Anthropic 提供 Claude 系列大型语言模型，以其性能、可靠性和安全性而闻名，可通过原生 API 进行访问。

description.en: Moonshot AI offers Kimi, an intelligent assistant with ultra-long context capabilities, providing powerful text generation and reasoning.
description.zh-CN: 月之暗面（Moonshot AI）提供 Kimi 智能助手，拥有超长无损上下文能力，提供强大的文本生成和推理功能。

description.en: Google Gemini offers a family of powerful, multimodal models for advanced reasoning, text generation, and embedding tasks.
description.zh-CN: Google Gemini 提供一系列功能强大的多模态模型，用于高级推理、文本生成和向量嵌入任务。

description.en: NVIDIA offers a catalog of community and NVIDIA-built generative AI models, optimized for performance and accessible via an OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: NVIDIA 提供由社区和 NVIDIA 构建的生成式 AI 模型目录，经性能优化，可通过兼容 OpenAI 的 API 进行访问。

description.en: Stability AI provides open-source generative models for image, video, audio, and 3D generation, accessible via its native API.
description.zh-CN: Stability AI 提供用于图像、视频、音频和 3D 生成的开源生成模型，可通过其原生 API 进行访问。

description.en: Voyage AI specializes in high-performance embedding models for search and RAG applications, offering state-of-the-art performance.
description.zh-CN: Voyage AI 专注于为搜索和 RAG 应用提供高性能的向量嵌入模型，提供业界领先的性能。

description.en: Jina AI offers some of the best open-source text and multimodal embedding models, available via an OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: Jina AI 提供业界领先的开源文本和多模态向量嵌入模型，可通过兼容 OpenAI 的 API 使用。

description.en: Minimax offers powerful foundation models including text and multimodal capabilities, accessible via its native API.
description.zh-CN: MiniMax（名之梦）提供包括文本和多模态能力的强大基础模型，可通过其原生 API 访问。

description.en: Baichuan Intelligence provides a series of large language models, including its Baichuan series, accessible via an OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: 百川智能提供一系列大语言模型，包括其百川系列，可通过兼容 OpenAI 的 API 进行访问。

description.en: StepFun develops the Step series of foundation models, offering powerful language and multimodal capabilities through an OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: 阶跃星辰开发 Step 系列基础模型，通过兼容 OpenAI 的 API 提供强大的语言和多模态能力。

description.en: Volces (Volcano Engine) provides ByteDance's Doubao (豆包) large language models and comprehensive AI services, offering powerful text generation, embedding, and multimodal capabilities through an OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: Volces（火山引擎）提供字节跳动的豆包大模型和全面的 AI 服务，通过兼容 OpenAI 的 API 提供强大的文本生成、向量嵌入和多模态能力。

description.en: FAL provides fast and scalable AI inference for media generation, including audio, image, and video generation models with optimized performance.
description.zh-CN: FAL 提供快速且可扩展的 AI 推理服务，用于媒体生成，包括音频、图像和视频生成模型，具有优化的性能。
